languages.text: "Еретик упомянул, что разрушение алтаря чревато смертями среди местного населения. Лгал он или пытался манипулировать нами — не важно: мерзость должно уничтожить. Что касается жертв... Император узнает своих".

"The heretic mentioned that destroying the altar would risk deaths among the local population. Whether he was lying or trying to manipulate us is irrelevant: the abomination must be destroyed. As for any casualties... The Emperor will know His own."
languages.original_text: "Еретик упомянул, что разрушение алтаря чревато смертями среди местного населения. Лгал он или пытался манипулировать нами — не важно: мерзость должно уничтожить. Что касается жертв... Император узнает своих".

traits.locale_text: "The heretic mentioned that destroying the altar would risk deaths among the local population. Whether he was lying or trying to manipulate us is irrelevant: the abomination must be destroyed. As for any casualties... The Emperor will know His own."

"The heretic mentioned that destroying the altar would risk deaths among the local population. Whether he was lying or trying to manipulate us is irrelevant: the abomination must be destroyed. As for any casualties... The Emperor will know His own."

languages.text: "Der Ketzer wies darauf hin, dass die Zerstörung des Altars zu Todesfällen unter der einheimischen Bevölkerung führen könnte. Ob er log oder uns manipulieren wollte, ist unwichtig: Die Abscheulichkeit muss zerstört werden. Und was die Todesfälle angeht ... Der Imperator erkennt die Seinen."
languages.original_text: "The heretic mentioned that destroying the altar would risk deaths among the local population. Whether he was lying or trying to manipulate us is irrelevant: the abomination must be destroyed. As for any casualties... The Emperor will know His own."

traits.locale_text: "Der Ketzer wies darauf hin, dass die Zerstörung des Altars zu Todesfällen unter der einheimischen Bevölkerung führen könnte. Ob er log oder uns manipulieren wollte, ist unwichtig: Die Abscheulichkeit muss zerstört werden. Und was die Todesfälle angeht ... Der Imperator erkennt die Seinen."

languages.text: « À en croire l'hérétique, la destruction de l'autel risquerait de faire des victimes parmi la population locale. Mais qu'il ait menti ou cherché à nous manipuler, peu importe : cette abomination doit être détruite. Quant aux morts éventuels... Ma foi, l'Empereur reconnaîtra les Siens. »
languages.original_text: "The heretic mentioned that destroying the altar would risk deaths among the local population. Whether he was lying or trying to manipulate us is irrelevant: the abomination must be destroyed. As for any casualties... The Emperor will know His own."

traits.locale_text: « À en croire l'hérétique, la destruction de l'autel risquerait de faire des victimes parmi la population locale. Mais qu'il ait menti ou cherché à nous manipuler, peu importe : cette abomination doit être détruite. Quant aux morts éventuels... Ma foi, l'Empereur reconnaîtra les Siens. »

languages.text: “这个异端分子提到，摧毁祭坛可能会对当地居民造成伤亡。虽然不知道他是在说谎，还是打算操纵我们，但这无关紧要。这件邪恶的造物必须摧毁，至于造成的伤亡……帝皇会理解的。”
languages.original_text: "The heretic mentioned that destroying the altar would risk deaths among the local population. Whether he was lying or trying to manipulate us is irrelevant: the abomination must be destroyed. As for any casualties... The Emperor will know His own."

traits.locale_text: “这个异端分子提到，摧毁祭坛可能会对当地居民造成伤亡。虽然不知道他是在说谎，还是打算操纵我们，但这无关紧要。这件邪恶的造物必须摧毁，至于造成的伤亡……帝皇会理解的。”

languages.text: «El hereje mencionó que destruir el altar causaría muertes entre la población local. Es irrelevante si mentía o si trataba de manipularnos: la abominación debe ser destruida. Si se producen bajas... el Emperador reconocerá a los Suyos».
languages.original_text: "The heretic mentioned that destroying the altar would risk deaths among the local population. Whether he was lying or trying to manipulate us is irrelevant: the abomination must be destroyed. As for any casualties... The Emperor will know His own."

traits.locale_text: «El hereje mencionó que destruir el altar causaría muertes entre la población local. Es irrelevante si mentía o si trataba de manipularnos: la abominación debe ser destruida. Si se producen bajas... el Emperador reconocerá a los Suyos».

languages.text: 「異端者は祭壇を破壊すれば地元住民の死者が出ると述べていました。彼が嘘をついているのか、私たちを操ろうとしているのかは問題ではありません。この忌まわしいものは必ず破壊されなければなりません。犠牲者が出ようとも…皇帝陛下はご自身の者を見極められるでしょう」
languages.original_text: "The heretic mentioned that destroying the altar would risk deaths among the local population. Whether he was lying or trying to manipulate us is irrelevant: the abomination must be destroyed. As for any casualties... The Emperor will know His own."

traits.locale_text: 「異端者は祭壇を破壊すれば地元住民の死者が出ると述べていました。彼が嘘をついているのか、私たちを操ろうとしているのかは問題ではありません。この忌まわしいものは必ず破壊されなければなりません。犠牲者が出ようとも…皇帝陛下はご自身の者を見極められるでしょう」

languages.text: "Kâfir, sunağın yok edilmesinin yerliler arasında ölümlere yol açabileceğini söylemişti. Bu yalan mıydı yoksa bizi kandırmaya mı çalışıyordu... Önemi yok. Kâfirliğin yok edilmesi gerekir. Olası zayiatlara gelirsek... İmparator, O'ndan olanı tanıyacaktır elbet."
languages.original_text: "The heretic mentioned that destroying the altar would risk deaths among the local population. Whether he was lying or trying to manipulate us is irrelevant: the abomination must be destroyed. As for any casualties... The Emperor will know His own."

traits.locale_text: "Kâfir, sunağın yok edilmesinin yerliler arasında ölümlere yol açabileceğini söylemişti. Bu yalan mıydı yoksa bizi kandırmaya mı çalışıyordu, bir önemi yok. Sapkınlıkların yok edilmesi gerekir. Olası zayiatlara gelirsek... İmparator, O'ndan olanı tanıyacaktır elbet."
